roleset.name: target
roleset.note: ZERO_IN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'zero' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from zero.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ready, aim, fire!
example.text: In making cases, the authorities frequently zero in on alleged misrepresentations made by the charities' fund raisers.
example.arg: on alleged misrepresentations made by the charities' fund raisers

example.name: graft
example.text: They were appalled, for instance, that [he]-1 wanted *trace*-1 to target more of the $3 billion Community Development Block Grant program to low-income projects and zero out the notorious ``discretionary'' funds that have allowed HUD officials to steer contracts to political cronies.
example.arg: the notorious ``discretionary'' funds that have allowed HUD officials to steer contracts to political cronies
